    • Method Detail

      • registerFactory

        public static IConfigSourceFactory registerFactory(String type,
                                                   IConfigSourceFactory factory)
        Register new config source factory.
        Parameters:
        type - the name to be used to represent this factory
        factory - the factory instance
        Returns:
        null if registered; factory instance of the name already in use

      • instance

        public static ConfigSourceFactory instance()

      • create

        public IConfigSource create(File folder,
                            String fileName)
        Create a ConfigSource using the default factory (gson).
        Parameters:
        folder - the folder where config file will reside
        fileName - name of the file without any dots. The underlying factory will append the extension as needed.
        Returns:
        the new config source responsible for the given folder and fileName

      • create

        public IConfigSource create(String type,
                            File folder,
                            String fileName)
        Parameters:
        type - type of the config source.
        folder - the folder where config file will reside
        fileName - name of the file without any dots. The underlying factory will append the extension as needed.
        Returns:
        the new config source responsible for the given folder and fileName
